Contents.Subtitle: Host locally
Contents.Intro: Javascript 'fetch()' cannot access local files due to security settings. To see how code works while developing, it is possible to host locally.

Cheats.Explanation: If you have python installed, run this in the folder, where index.html and others are located. You may switch the port.
Or with npm live-server when having js as type='module'

Close by Ctrl+C. To properly remove all before next host session, you need to remove cached images and files as well as hosted app data.
